Name: Dragon Mission
About the game: Calanguito sees his kingdom being attacked by the Order in Chaos. When saving his king from an abduction attempt he discovers that other kingdoms are also being attacked and he is incubated to save them as well. Help Calanguito save his people from eternal chaos, in this unprecedented adventure in Dragonia. With more engaging simple combat, face the most diverse beings of this fantastic world.
